turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, can you recommend some music for me? I'm in the mood for something... upbeat.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, good question. I guess something like... pop punk? Maybe a little more on the 'pop' side than the 'punk' side, if that makes sense.

turns.speaker: agent
